name: The Steam Heart
description:
Immerse yourself in The Steam Heart - a puzzle adventure game in which you play as an unknown robot powered by steam. The story of the main protagonist is yet to be discovered. Try to solve mysterious puzzles, and don't forget - robots are stronger together!

CONTROLS:

KeyboardGamepadActionW, A, S, DLeft JoystickMove
EBSelect Next ItemFAApply / Pick-upQXDrop Item

RECOMMENDED REQUIREMENTS:

Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

  • OS:  Windows 10, 64-bit
  • Processor:  Intel CPU Core i7
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics:  Nvidia GPU GeForce GTX 660
